text: Annual Prime membership $139 auto-renewed on November 27 without notification. Want to downgrade to monthly $14.99 subscription instead.
I can switch your billing from $139 annual to $14.99 monthly. Next charge will be November 1 at monthly rate. Prorated refund processing.
Enrolled in 30-day free trial on November 24. Got charged $139 immediately instead of after trial period. Trial supposed to be free.
I'll transition your Prime Student membership to regular Prime. Billing cycle adjusts to $14.99 annually. Benefits remain identical.
Subscribed to Prime Student discount $89.99 annually. Graduated last month. Need to switch to regular Prime membership billing.
I see the charge after cancellation date. That's billing error. Processing $14.99 refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Credit card statement shows $29.99 charge on November 28 but I cancelled Prime membership on October 22. Need refund for unauthorized billing.
